mapper.select: SELECT c.id as idColonia, c.nombre as colonia, c.ciudad as ciudad, m.nombre as municipio, e.nombre as estado, c.codigo_postal as codigoPostal FROM colonias c INNER JOIN municipios m ON m.id = c.municipio INNER JOIN estados e ON e.id = m.estado WHERE c.codigo_postal = #{codigoPostal}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO direccion(calle, numero, idColonia) VALUES (#{calle}, #{numero}, #{idColonia})
